response.overview: Detem's life, once filled with joy, gradually becomes overshadowed by sadness, misery, and unfortunate circumstances. However, when a devastating prognosis from his doctor shatters his world, a flicker of hope ignites within him. Detem embraces newfound resilience and optimism, defying the struggles of his past. With unwavering determination, he navigates through the depths of despair, rediscovering the beauty of life's bittersweet moments. But will the consequences of his past catch up to him?
response.title: Perspective
